long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience a new level of search engine functionality with the integration of OpenAI ChatGPT! ChatGPT is now accessible on any website through the ChatGPT helper function.

With the ChatGPT for Google browser extension, you can optimize your search engine experience by integrating OpenAI's language model to get ChatGPT's response in addition to regular search engine results. This feature provides quick and easy access to information.

The extension allows you to converse directly with ChatGPT through the extension, providing natural and human-like responses. ChatGPT for Google supports popular search engines such as Google, Bing, and DuckDuckGo, making it convenient for users who switch between different search engines.

Apart from the powerful search engine integration, ChatGPT for Google offers several other features like the ChatGPT Helper function that permits you to utilize ChatGPT on any website. Additionally, you can offer feedback to enhance ChatGPT, utilize custom trigger mode, and copy responses to a clipboard.

Using ChatGPT for Google is easy; all you need to do is log in to chat.openai.com and initiate a conversation with ChatGPT through the extension. In case of any issues, you can report a bug in the review section of the extension's page.

It's important to keep in mind that the use of other ChatGPT extensions simultaneously is not supported or endorsed by ChatGPT for Google. Therefore, users must uninstall all other ChatGPT extensions before installing ChatGPT for Google. ChatGPT for Google is an excellent tool for anyone who wants to make the most out of their search engine results.
